TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but they get louder and deafen you, moving in to kill you with sound.

I wish that I didn't get baking soda mixed up with bacon soda for 30,000 years.

Granted. Instead, you will get them confused for 30,000 EONS!!!!!

I wish I had a mildly scary voice, like the kind you'd hear from fire-breathing butterflies.

Granted, but you kill yourself with it.

I wish for Comet ISON to come out from behind the Sun.

Granted. It's now heading straight for Earth.

I wish I wasn't so hyper today. *twitch* *twitch*

Granted, but you're more hyper.

I wish for space shuttles to work in KSP.

Granted, the challenger space shuttle is now in ksp

I wish for google+ to die

Granted. I don't think I have the heart to corrupt this...

I wish I had the heart to corrupt this.

Granted but you make Youtube die with it.

I wish I had a ps4.

Granted you get a bricked one

I wish i could teleport

Granted, but you can only teleport to the sun's surface.

I wish that ksp looked like space engine.

Granted. It becomes a copy of Space Engine.

I wish for some tea.

granted you burn yourself

I wish you didn't ninja me.

Granted, but everyone else ninjas you.

I wish that I had the gun from portal.

Granted. It's a replica and you Kill Santa Claus for the real one.

I wish I wasn't a soda addict.

Granted. Instead you're a coffee addict.

I wish I was a samurai.

Granted. You are a samurai, but are actually a samurai, as in, a thousand or so years in the past. Good luck.

I wish someone would make a Portal mod for KSP.

Granted, but some idiot opens a portal between the Sun and Kerbin and forever dooms Kerbal-kind.

I wish for sleep.

Granted, but if you sleep, you can't move, and while not moving, you're dead

I wish i could have a dog tail

Granted, you have a dog tail on your forehead

I wish for hot chocolate

Granted, but it's superheated plasma and you die as soon as you touch the cup. Spontaneous combustion.

I wish to be well rested.

Granted, but a solar flare reaches and grabs your face and pulls you into the sun.

I wish that my KSP space probe would stop exploding 58 seconds after launch.
Granted, but your KSP probe explodes 10 seconds after launch

Granted, your probe explodes 1 second after launch.

I wish the wish I am about to wish is not corrupted.

Granted, but it starts exploding before launch instead.

I wish life was more interesting.

Granted, but you got ninja'd.

I wish to know what the voices in my head were screaming about.
